alert.note: Alert for Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 20 at 4:09PM CST until November 20 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL BEAUREGARD...SOUTHWESTERN VERNON PARISHES IN WEST CENTRAL LOUISIANA AND NORTHEASTERN NEWTON COUNTIES... At 409 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stringtown, or 8 miles southeast of Burkeville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Rosepine, Burr Ferry, Junction, and Evans. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southwestern and west central Louisiana...and southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
